If you are getting white screen I would recommend updating direct x and .net framework. I haven't got to the part on the bike yet though, we'll see what happens.

Works #1, except doesn't look like all the DLC are there, only the Just Cause 2 thing show up in the DLC menu.

I got a some kind old rig and game works #1, not with the extreme graphics (didn't try that I know I couldn't handle that) but with the following the game runs smooth :

Core2Quad Q9400 2.6GHZ
6GB DDR2 800 Corsair
PNY GeForce 9600GT 512MB DDR3
Windows 7 Ultimate 64bits.
Standard HD (will soon have a SSD)

The DLC is there. The Triad Enforcer pack doesn't show up, since it comes natively with every digital download of the game. If you check the installed files there are files that end with HD.big/.bix. The easiest way of checking if your HD texture pack is working and enabled is by looking at neon textures ingame, because there is a huge difference between low and high res.
